addExistingTerminology._instruction: Add an existing terminology in which the suggested term should be integrated in.
addExistingTerminology.description: Reference to an existing terminology (distinct class to group related terms).
addExistingTerminology.title: Add existing terminology

definition._instruction: Enter one sentence for defining this term.
definition.description: Short, but precise statement of the meaning of a word, word group, sign or a symbol.
definition.title: Definition

description._instruction: Enter a short text describing this term.
description.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
description.title: Description

name._instruction: Controlled term originating from a defined terminology.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: Name

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the related ontological term.
ontologyIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
ontologyIdentifier.title: Ontology identifier

suggestNewTerminology._instruction: Propose a name for a new terminology in which the suggested term should be integrated in.
suggestNewTerminology.description: Proposal of a new distinct class to group related terms.
suggestNewTerminology.title: Suggest new terminology
